verbs.description: [V: is] glenn beck network the blaze collapsing he walked out of a cnn interview when asked glenn beck empire of talk has been crumbling for years the daily beast wrote last week in an anonymously sourced article when brian stelter asked beck about it on cnn beck laughed briefly said no and unhooked his microphone janet reno beck stelter glenn beck dallas supreme court
